title: ranga bArO krSNa
sahitya:
ranga bArO krSNa bArO 


anupallavi

  mangaLAtmaka manasijayyane angaja janaka kALinga mardana bArO


caraNam 1    puNDarIkAkSa shrI rAmacandra bArO kOdaNDavane piDida mukunda bArO 
pANDu sutara kAyida parabrahma bArO uddaNDa rUpa tALida narasimhane bArO
    caraNam 2    mAva kamsana konda mahimane bArO macca kUrma varaha narasimha bArO 
nishcintya vAmana trivikrama bArO svacchamUrti divya rUpada vastu bArO
    caraNam 3    koDaliyanu piDida kaDu shUra bArO tEjiyanErida ennoDeya bArO 
jagadoDeya purandara viTTalarAya vEnkaTaramaNane nInIga bArO
